summary: In small-town Poland in the late 1950s, an aging woman married to a workaholic doctor meets a young man who makes her feel young again. Framed around this story, lead actress Krystyna Janda discusses the death of her husband from cancer.
cast: Krystyna Janda|Pawel Szajda|Jan Englert|Jadwiga Jankowska-Cieslak|Julia Pietrucha|Roma Gasiorowska|Krzysztof Skonieczny|Pawel Tomaszewski|Mateusz Kosciukiewicz|Marcin Luczak|Marcin Korcz|Maciej Kowalik|Jerzy Mizak|Marcin Starzecki|Andrzej Wajda|Jakub Mazurek|Michal Kasprzak-Komarczewski|Krystian Kopanski|Karol Kosik|Arkadiusz Lewicki|Tomasz Lukaszewski|Magdalena Michel|Jaroslaw Panter|Agnieszka Sowa|Maciej Switajski|Zbigniew Sznitko
title: Tatarak
